question: What is the main purpose of Lombok in Java?
options: To generate boilerplate code like getters, setters, constructors
answer: To generate boilerplate code like getters, setters, constructors

question: If you use @AllArgsConstructor in Lombok, what happens to the default no-argument constructor?
What does @Data annotation in Lombok provide?
Which of the following is NOT generated by @Data annotation?
Where can you verify Lombok-generated methods (getters, setters, constructors) in Eclipse IDE?
In Eclipse, how do you configure Lombok after downloading the JAR?
options: Double click lombok.jar, select eclipse.exe, click install & update
answer: Double click lombok.jar, select eclipse.exe, click install & update

question: What is the JAR file used to add Lombok support in a project?
What is the purpose of the Builder Design Pattern in Java/Lombok?
options: To automatically generate getters and setters
To simplify object creation by setting properties step-by-step
To connect the application to a database
answer: To simplify object creation by setting properties step-by-step

question: What is the purpose of a constructor in Java?
options: To initialize the data to object when an instance is created
To generate getters and setters automatically
answer: To initialize the data to object when an instance is created

question: What is the purpose of a setter method?
options: To retrieve the value of a field
To update or set the value of a field
answer: To update or set the value of a field

question: What is the purpose of the toString() method?
options: To return a string representation of the complete object data
answer: To return a string representation of the complete object data

question: What is the purpose of equals() and hashCode() methods in Java?
options: To compare objects data equality and store them in collections Set properly
To generate getter and setter methods
answer: To compare objects data equality and store them in collections Set properly

question: What is the purpose of a getter method?
options: To update the value of a field
To retrieve or read the value of a field
answer: To retrieve or read the value of a field

question: What happens to the default constructor if you explicitly define an all-argument constructor in your class?
options: The default constructor is still available

question: What is a default constructor in Java?
options: A constructor provided by Java when no constructor is explicitly defined
A method that prints object data
A constructor that throws an exception
answer: A constructor provided by Java when no constructor is explicitly defined
